projects.name: Online Chat Applications
projects.description: The application is an online real-time chat platform with a multitude of features. It includes functionalities for online and offline status, allowing users to see when others are available to chat. Additionally, the app provides message read/unread indicators, letting users know if their messages have been viewed by recipients. Users are also able to send various types of media, such as photos, videos, and documents, enhancing communication and collaboration. Furthermore, the application allows users to create groups, enabling them to gather like-minded individuals or collaborate with specific teams for more efficient communication and sharing of information. Overall, the platform offers a comprehensive and seamless chat experience with its range of features.

projects.name: ISOP Application
projects.description: The application is designed to facilitate access to resources for ISOP (International Standard for Organization and Processes) certification, providing users with a comprehensive platform to aid them in their certification journey. One of the key features of the application is its robust security measures, offering a high level of protection for user accounts and data. This is achieved through the implementation of 2 Factor Authentication, which adds an extra layer of security by requiring users to provide two different forms of identification before gaining access to their accounts. Furthermore, the application incorporates multi-role authentication, which allows users with different levels of authorization to access specific resources and functionalities within the platform. This ensures that only authorized individuals can access sensitive information or perform certain actions, safeguarding the integrity of the certification process. The application also boasts an efficient and user-friendly Admin Panel, empowering administrators with the necessary tools to manage users, resources, and access permissions effectively. Through the Admin Panel, administrators can monitor user activity, grant or revoke access privileges, and oversee the overall functioning of the platform. Overall, the ISOP certification application is a comprehensive and secure solution that empowers users to navigate their certification process with confidence, leveraging advanced authentication mechanisms and an intuitive Admin Panel to streamline their experience and ensure compliance with ISOP standards.
